thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Ian(Mr M)
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Ian(Mr M)

author: Ian(Mr M)
title: Ian(Mr M)
text: Sri Lanka: The tour guide/s, bus driver and assistant were excellent. The whole trip was a wonderful experience (except for some people who didn't get what the tour was all about!!). Loved the time spent there, the people were welcoming and friendly. Great experience.
